name: Mini Golf Professional Game
description:
Mini Golf Professional Game fun as ever. Mini Golf Professional Game with incredible 3D effects that keeps you playing. Mini Golf Professional Game has perfectly tuned physics of golf ball so that you can enjoy ultimate experience of golfing. Mini Golf Professional Game has 5 different cool playing environments and perfect graphics.

In Mini Golf Professional Game you play with six different characters for real feel of golf.

As you work your way through the holes you will need to hit the ball through loops, skeletons, around pumpkins and all other sorts of creepy interactive objects and obstacles.

Features:

- Five different Environment
- Character Selection
- Play with Character for real feel
- Change the direction of ball shot by swiping Left / Right
- Zoom-in/Zoom-out by pinch
- Highly Addictive Sport Simulator
- Simple controls
- Best graphics and music
- Free to play

How to Play:

Pinch for Zoom-in/Zoom-out.Swipe on screen to adjust direction of golf ball (left or right).Pot the ball with in Par limits to complete levels.
Score must be zero to unlock next stage.

So go on, let's see if you have the crazy skills to take on this mini golf .professional game.

Share with your friends & family and compete your HighScore with them...
